1.1.name: wordpress/ycwp-qr-me
1.1.description: YCWP QR Me is a simple plugin that creates and displays QR Code in your blog pages. It provides also a configurable and useful widget and shortcodes. You can add your own QR Code in a widget ready sidebar, or in a post using shortcodes. You can also automatically add your preconfigured QR Code at the end of each post and choose if you want to display it only on single posts pages.
